name: ICE (Impossible Worlds)
description:
ICE is a ten-day #cyberpunkjam game made using Unity3D by a single member of Impossible Worlds.

In the Cyberpunk world, the termICE stands for Intrusion Countermeasure Electronics and is normally shorthand for a type of security software designed to protect systems from hacking.

In ICE players take control of a cyberspace construct for one such ICE program and must defend an unknown computer system from relentless cyber attack from all directions.
